entry.title: frame 태그
entry.content:
cols

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
  <frameset cols="25%,*,25%">
    <frame src="atest.html">
    <frame src="dltest.html">
    <frame src="ptest.html">
  </frameset>
</html>

rows

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
  <frameset rows="25%,*,25%">
    <frame src="atest.html">
    <frame src="dltest.html">
    <frame src="ptest.html">
  </frameset>
</html>

noframes

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
  <frameset rows="25%,*,25%">
    <frame src="atest.html">
    <frame src="dltest.html">
    <frame src="ptest.html">
    <noframes>이 브라우저는 프레임을 지원하지 않습니다.</noframes>
  </frameset>
</html>

target

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <!-- frametest.html -->
  <frameset rows="10%,*">
    <frame src="ptest.html">
    <frame src="frametest2.html">
  </frameset>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <!-- frametest2.html -->
  <frameset cols="15%,*">
    <frame src="dltest.html" />
    <frame src="atest.html" />
  </frameset>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<!-- atest.html -->
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <title>a 태그</title>
</head>
<body>
  <p>
    <a href="oltest.html" target="_parent">target="_parent"</a>
  </p>
  <p>
    <a href="oltest.html" target="_top">target="_top"</a>
  </p>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: cols <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="ko"> <frameset cols="25%,*,25%"> <frame src="atest.html"> <frame src="dltest.html"> <frame src="ptest.html"> </frameset> </html>

entry.title: form 태그
entry.content:
기본 태그

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

accept-charset

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" accept-charset="UTF-8">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

autocomplete

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" autocomplete="off">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

enctype

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="post" enctype="application/x-www-form-urlencoded">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

novalidate

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" novalidate>
  <input type="email" name="email_txt">
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

target - _blank, _self

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" target="_blank">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

결과

target - _parent, _top

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<!-- frametest.html -->
<frameset rows="10%,*">
  <frame src="ptest.html">
  <frame src="frametest2.html">
  <noframes>Sorry, your browser does not handle frames!</noframes>
</frameset>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<!-- frametest2.html -->
<frameset cols="15%,*">
    <frame src="dltest.html" />
    <frame src="formtest2.html" />
  </frameset>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<!-- formtest2.html -->
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" target="_parent">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

결과

target - framename

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<!-- formtest3.html -->
<head>
  <title>form test</title>
</head>
<body>
<form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get" target="frm2">
  <input type="text" name="txt1" />
  <input type="text" name="txt2" />
  <input type="submit">
</form>
<iframe name="frm2" src="ptest.html"></iframe>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: 기본 태그 <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>form test</title> </head> <body> <form name="frm" action="atest.html" method="get"> <input type="text" name="txt1" /> <input type="text" name="txt2" /> <input type="submit"> </form> </body> </html>

entry.title: video 태그
entry.content:
기본 비디오 샘플

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--videotest1.html --> 
<head>
    <title>video 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>기본 비디오 샘플</h1>
<video src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4" controls>
  Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos,  
    but don't worry, you can 
  <a href="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4">download it</a>  
  and watch it with your favorite video player!
</video>
</body>
</html>

결과

옵션들

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--videotest2.html --> 
<head>
    <title>video 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>옵션</h1>
<video src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4" autoplay controls loop>
  Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos,  
    but don't worry, you can 
  <a href="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4">download it</a>  
  and watch it with your favorite video player!
</video>
</body>
</html>

결과

포스터

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--videotest3.html --> 
<head>
    <title>video 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>포스터</h1>
<video src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4" 
    poster="https://www.w3schools.com/images/w3html5.gif">
  Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos,  
    but don't worry, you can 
  <a href="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4">download it</a>  
  and watch it with your favorite video player!
</video>
</body>
</html>

결과

source

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--videotest4.html --> 
<head>
    <title>video 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>source</h1>
<video width="320" height="240" controls>
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/movie.ogg" type="video/ogg">
  죄송합니다. 당신의 브라우저는 HTML5 동영상을 지원하지 않습니다.
</video>
</body>
</html>

결과

자막

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--videotest5.html --> 
<head>
    <title>video 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>자막</h1>
<video controls="" class="trackSupported">
  <source src="/assets/developerStories-en.webm" type="video/webm; codecs="vp8, vorbis"">
  <track src="/assets/developerStories-subtitles-en.vtt" label="English subtitles" kind="subtitles" srclang="en" default="">
</video>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: 기본 비디오 샘플 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="ko"> <!--videotest1.html --> <head> <title>video 태그</title> <meta charset="UTF-8"> </head> <body> <h1>기본 비디오 샘플</h1> <video src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4" controls> Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos, but don't worry, you can <a href="https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4">download it</a> and watch it with your favorite video player! </video> </body> </html> 결과

entry.title: meta 태그
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
	<meta name="Date" content="2016-02-15T07:45:37+09:00" />

	<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
	<!-- 브라우저 호환성 지정 -->

	<!--<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="60" /> -->
	<!-- 화면 갱신 / 60초-->
	<!-- <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="3;url=https://www.daum.net/"> -->
	<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache" /> 
	<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache" />
	<!--캐시가 되지 않도록 지정-->
	<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="Mon, 08 Sep 2011 12:00:00 GMT"> 
	<!-- 캐쉬 만료일 -->

	<meta property="og:url" content="https://devpiki.github.io/">
	<meta property="og:type" content="website">
	<meta property="og:title" content="Piki's blog">
	<meta property="og:image" content="//devpiki.github.io/assets/smiley.gif">
	<meta property="og:description" content="html5, css3, javascript">

	<title></title>

</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>

결과

entry.title: imagemap
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>image map test</title>
</head>
<body>
  <img src="../../planets.gif" width="145" height="126" alt="Planets" usemap="#planetmap">

  <map name="planetmap">
    <area shape="rect" coords="0,0,82,126" alt="Sun" href="ptest.html" target="_blank"/>
    <area shape="circle" coords="90,58,3" alt="Mercury" href="oltest.html"  target="_blank"/>
    <area shape="circle" coords="124,58,8" alt="Venus" href="dltest.html"  target="_blank"/>
  </map>
</body>
</html>

결과

entry.title: img 태그
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <title>img 태그</title>
</head>
<body>
  <h1>img</h1>

  <h2>width, height</h2>
  <p><img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" /></p>

  <h2>alt, title</h2>
  <p><img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" title="웃는 얼굴" width="42" height="42" /></p>

  <h2>align="bottom"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.  <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="bottom"> 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>



  <h2>align="bottom"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.  <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="bottom"> 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>

  <h2>align="middle"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="middle"> 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>

  <h2>align="top"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="top"> 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>

  <h2>align="left"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="left">이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>

  <h2>align="right"</h2>
  <p>이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. <img src="../../smiley.gif" alt="Smiley face" width="42" height="42" align="right">이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다. 이미지의 위치를 확인합니다.</p>

</body>
</html>

결과

entry.title: figure, figcaption 태그
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--figuretest.html --> 
<head>
    <title>figure 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<p>Pulpit Rock은 노르웨이의 Forsand 에있는 604m (1982ft)에 달하는 거대한 절벽입니다. 
절벽의 꼭대기는 약 25 x 25 m 이며 거의 평평합니다.
 이 절벽은 노르웨이의 유명한 관광 명소입니다</p>
<figure>
  <img src="/assets/img_pulpit.jpg" 
  alt="The Pulpit Rock" width="304" height="228">
  <figcaption>그림1. 노르웨이 Pulpit Rock</figcaption>
</figure>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="ko"> <!--figuretest.html --> <head> <title>figure 태그</title> <meta charset="UTF-8"> </head> <body> <p>Pulpit Rock은 노르웨이의 Forsand 에있는 604m (1982ft)에 달하는 거대한 절벽입니다. 절벽의 꼭대기는 약 25 x 25 m 이며 거의 평평합니다. 이 절벽은 노르웨이의 유명한 관광 명소입니다</p> <figure> <img src="/assets/img_pulpit.jpg" alt="The Pulpit Rock" width="304" height="228"> <figcaption>그림1. 노르웨이 Pulpit Rock</figcaption> </figure> </body> </html> 결과

entry.title: audio 태그
entry.content:
기본 오디오 샘플

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--audiotest1.html --> 
<head>
    <title>audio 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>기본 오디오 샘플</h1>
<audio src="https://www.w3schools.com/tags/horse.mp3" controls>
  Your browser does not support the <code>audio</code> element.
</audio>
</body>
</html>

결과

옵션들

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<!--audiotest2.html --> 
<head>
    <title>audio 태그</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
</head>
<body>
<h1>옵션들</h1>
<audio src="https://www.w3schools.com/tags/horse.mp3" 
  controls autoplay>
  Your browser does not support the <code>audio</code> element.
</audio>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: 기본 오디오 샘플 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="ko"> <!--audiotest1.html --> <head> <title>audio 태그</title> <meta charset="UTF-8"> </head> <body> <h1>기본 오디오 샘플</h1> <audio src="https://www.w3schools.com/tags/horse.mp3" controls> Your browser does not support the <code>audio</code> element. </audio> </body> </html> 결과

entry.title: a 태그
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <title>a 태그</title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- 텍스트에 태그  -->
  <p>
    <a href="https://www.daum.net">DAUM</a>
  </p>
  <!-- 이미지에 태그  -->
  <p>
    <a href="https://www.daum.net"><img src="../../logo.png" /></a>
  </p>
  <!-- target  -->
  <p>
  <a href="https://www.daum.net" target="_blank">DAUM</a>
  </p>
  <p>
  <a href="https://www.daum.net" target="_self">DAUM</a>
  </p>
  <p>
  <a href="oltest.html" target="ultest">OL test</a>
  </p>
  <p>
  <iframe src="ultest.html" name="ultest"></iframe>
  </p>
  <!-- download  -->
  <p>
    <a href="../../logo.png" download>
      <img src="../../logo.png" />
    </a>
  </p>
</body>
</html>

결과
entry.summary: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <title>a 태그</title> </head> <body> <!-- 텍스트에 태그 --> <p> <a href="https://www.daum.net">DAUM</a> </p> <!-- 이미지에 태그 --> <p> <a href="https://www.daum.net"><img src="../../logo.png" /></a> </p> <!-- target --> <p> <a href="https://www.daum.net" target="_blank">DAUM</a> </p> <p> <a href="https://www.daum.net" target="_self">DAUM</a> </p> <p> <a href="oltest.html" target="ultest">OL test</a> </p> <p> <iframe src="ultest.html" name="ultest"></iframe> </p> <!-- download --> <p> <a href="../../logo.png" download> <img src="../../logo.png" /> </a> </p> </body> </html> 결과
